mapper.select: SELECT A.CARD_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_HITS, DELETE_YN, A.CDATETIME, A.UDATETIME, IMG_NAME, IMG_PATH FROM T4_CARDINFO A LEFT JOIN (SELECT CARD_NO, IMG_NAME, CONCAT(IMG_PATH, IMG_NAME) AS IMG_PATH FROM T4_CARDIMG WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' OR CARD_INDEX = 1)B ON A.CARD_NO = B.CARD_NO WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' LIMIT #{startNum}, 9
SELECT IMGFILE_NO, CARD_NO, CONCAT(IMG_PATH,IMG_NAME)IMG_PATH, CDATETIME, UDATETIME FROM T4_CARDIMG WHERE THUMBNAIL_YN = 'N' AND CARD_NO = #{cardNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_CARDINFO (CARD_NO, CARD_NAME, CARD_HITS, DELETE_YN, CDATETIME, UDATETIME) VALUES (NULL, #{cardName},0,'N',now(),now())
mapper.update: UPDATE T4_CARDIMG SET THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' WHERE CARD_INDEX = 1
mapper.select:
SELECT B.BOARD_NO AS BOARD_NO, B.USER_ID AS USER_ID, U.NICK AS NICK, U.STATUS AS STATUS, TITLE, CONTENT, HITS, CATEGORY, DATE_FORMAT(B.CDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS CDATETIME, DATE_FORMAT(B.UDATETIME,'%Y-%m-%d') AS UDATETIME, DELETE_YN, FILE_PATH FROM T4_BOARD B LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID, NICK, STATUS FROM T4_USER) U ON U.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T4_FILES F ON F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD_KIND = 'POL' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY CATEGORY DESC ,CDATETIME DESC
ORDER BY CATEGORY DESC ,HITS DESC
LIMIT #{startNum}, 10
SELECT COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM T4_BOARD WHERE BOARD_KIND = 'POL' AND DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.USER_ID AS USER_ID, U.NICK AS NICK, U.STATUS AS STATUS, TITLE, CONTENT, HITS, CATEGORY, B.CDATETIME AS CDATETIME, B.UDATETIME AS UDATETIME, DELETE_YN, CONCAT(FILE_PATH, SAVE_NAME) AS FILE_PATH FROM T4_BOARD B LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_ID, NICK, STATUS FROM T4_USER) U ON U.USER_ID = B.USER_ID LEFT JOIN T4_FILES F ON F.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO WHERE BOARD_KIND = 'POL'
AND B.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, C.USER_ID, CONTENT AS COMMENT, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, U.NICK AS NICK, DELETE_YN FROM T4_COMMENT C LEFT JOIN T4_USER U ON U.USER_ID = C.USER_ID WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T4_COMMENT (COMMENT_NO, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, CONTENT, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, DELETE_YN) VALUES (NULL, #{boardNo},#{userId},#{comment},now(),now(),'N')

INSERT INTO T4_BOARD ( BOARD_KIND, BOARD_NO, USER_ID, TITLE, CONTENT, CATEGORY, CDATETIME, UDATETIME, DELETE_YN, HITS) VALUES ('POL', NULL, #{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, now(), now(),'N',0)
mapper.update: UPDATE T4_BOARD SET CATEGORY = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, UDATETIME = NOW(), BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
